mapper.insert: insert into users (user_no, user_id, user_password, user_nickname, user_name, user_email, user_tel, user_address) values (user_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{address})
mapper.select: select user_no as no, user_id as id, user_password password, user_name name, user_email email, user_login_type loginType, user_disabled disabled, user_updated_date updatedDate, user_created_date createdDate from users where user_id = #{value}

select user_no as no, user_id as id, user_password password, user_name name, user_email email, user_login_type loginType, user_disabled disabled, user_updated_date updatedDate, user_created_date createdDate from users where user_email = #{value}
mapper.update: update users set user_password = #{password}, user_disabled = #{disabled}, user_updated_date = sysdate where user_no = #{no}
